Every Haldi decoration I create is a labor of love, designed to make the day even more special. It’s an honor to be a part of such a meaningful celebration, and I am grateful to be able to bring the couple’s vision to life through the timeless beauty of flowers. The beauty, simplicity, and warmth that flowers bring to the Haldi ceremony make it one of the most memorable and cherished aspects of the entire wedding.

The dulha dulhan mala is crafted with great care, using beautiful flowers like marigolds, roses, jasmine, and orchids, selected for their fragrance, vibrancy, and cultural significance. These flowers are chosen not just for their beauty but also for the joy and prosperity they represent. Every mala is designed to match the theme of the wedding, whether it’s traditional, modern, or even themed to suit the couple’s unique style
